tidbits.title: Lake Malawi
tidbits.description: Malawi is renowned for Lake Malawi, a UNESCO World Heritage Site, known for its crystal-clear waters and diverse aquatic life.

tidbits.title: Warm Hospitality
tidbits.description: The country is known for its warm hospitality, vibrant culture, and the friendliness of its people, often called the 'Warm Heart of Africa.'

tidbits.title: Stunning Landscapes
tidbits.description: Malawi offers stunning landscapes, including the Great Rift Valley, national parks, and high plateaus, ideal for hiking and safaris.
